de.crawcial.util

Class CouchDbCloneClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lightcouch.CouchDbClientBase
      • org.lightcouch.CouchDbClient
        • de.crawcial.util.CouchDbCloneClient

  • public class CouchDbCloneClient
extends org.lightcouch.CouchDbClient
    This class addresses a problem of LightCouch and offers a workaround to instantiate a new CouchDbClient from existing CouchDbProperties.
    Author:
    Sebastian Lauber

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CouchDbCloneClient(org.lightcouch.CouchDbProperties properties)
      This constructor works as the single parameter constructor of CouchDbClient but clones the properties object first.

      • CouchDbCloneClient

        public CouchDbCloneClient(org.lightcouch.CouchDbProperties properties)

        properties - CouchDbProperties to be cloned and used
